title: The S
clause_text: The S.R.S. proposal shall be allowed to be executed as Composite proposal, with adjacent encumbered or unencumbered buildable lands. In such a case, the developer may execute the S.R.S. along with any other encumbered or unencumbered buildable land, by availing benefits under the said Regulations on any of the land, restricting the scheme to the rehabilitation component area that existed prior to such composition. This shall even mean allowing rehabilitation component on one land and entire permissible in-situ free sale F.S.I. i.e Maximum Building potential as per UDCPR, on the other land.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
